name: Job Report
author: Huitzo Team
tagline: Find jobs that match your skills and experience
description: Let us do the job hunting legwork. Tell us what you're looking for, and we'll search job sites to find positions that match your skills and experience. Get a personalized report delivered to your email.
features: Search multiple job posting websites automatically
Match jobs based on your skills and qualifications
Get organized reports with job listings and details
Receive reports via email or in chat
Set up recurring job searches on your schedule
